title: elizaos Eliza (2025-04-02)
overview: Development focused on package improvements (project plugin loading first, related to starter project), new features (enhance avatar stack), 4 bug fixes. with 12 contributors merging 12 PRs. Major work included various improvements.

fixes: cache interaction cursor + duplicate memory creation
twitter, double memory creation attempt & server crash
project plugin loading first, related to starter project

issues_summary: working on 4 bugs including 'Failed to create Twitter client', 'ElizaOS always defaults to open AI' and implementing 1 feature requests including 'How to run Eliza CLI?'
